Item Class: Staves
Rarity: Rare
Spirit Goad
Sanctified Staff
--------
Requires: Level 72, 70 (unmet) Str, 70 Int
--------
Item Level: 78
--------
Grants Skill: Level 17 Consecrate
--------
Gain 54% of Damage as Extra Fire Damage
Gain 53% of Damage as Extra Cold Damage
+151 to maximum Mana
80% increased Critical Hit Chance for Spells
+25 to Intelligence
87% increased Mana Regeneration Rate
